constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 207 (Wednesday, December 1, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. AXNE:
H.R. 6100.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H6859]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Livestock and Foreign Agriculture.

title: To amend the Animal Welfare Act to increase enforcement with respect to violations of that Act, and for other purposes.
